title: Michael Crichton's Jurassic World: Jurassic Park / The Lost World
description: Now at last in one volume, Michael Crichton's Jurassic Park and The Lost World--the two incomparably suspenseful, supremely scary, utterly unputdownable, worldwide best-selling return-of-the-dinosaurs novels, which together constitute Jurassic World.--front flap
author: Michael Crichton
